level_4.prepend: from gameAPI import enemiesWithinRange, getFriendlyTroops, distanceToEntity
level_4.template:
def distributePoints(skill_points):
    health = 0
    damage = 0
    range = 0
    speed = 0
    return [health, damage, range, speed]

def decideAction(self):
    enemies = enemiesWithinRange(self)
    friendlies = getFriendlyTroops(self)
    distanceToBase = distanceToEntity(self, 1)
    distanceToFirst = distanceToEntity(self, friendlies[0])
    #self.attack(-1)
    #self.move(1)
